General.Name: Multifiling Mitra Indonesia
General.Description: PT Multifiling Mitra Indonesia Tbk provides integrated storage and record management services in Indonesia. The company offers document scanning and digital storage; secure shredding and IT asset recycling and disposition; retrieval of archive both paper and electronic based document; legal and vital records storage, file room, offsite records storage, and offsite tape vaulting services; and software and hardware implementation services. It also offers Iron Mountain Clean Start that navigates changing workplace requirements from dedensifying and reconfiguring the office for social distancing to office closures or moving to digital way of working; and Iron Mountain Connect, an online hub to find records at any time. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT Multifiling Mitra Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Iron Mountain Hong Kong Limited.
General.Address: Delta Silicon Industrial Park, Bekasi, Indonesia, 17550
